actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: To amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require printing in the Congressional Record of certain travel by Members.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to add rule LIV, requiring publication of specified information in the Congressional Record by a Member relating to his or her travel being paid for with appropriated funds (including that of a spouse or staff) other than travel between Washington, D.C. and the Member's district or within his or her district.

titles.title: To amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require printing in the Congressional Record of certain travel by Members.
